title: Cant login on my West Europe account and dont know enough information for support how?
body:
So i forgot my password or i have been hacked but i cant login on West-Europe and i am also not receiving any mails back regarding password change. 
I last did it in December 2016 and cant any longer.
 Now support is asking me questions about stuff i did in 2010 which i cant no longer remember. 
I have on buddy who is still active and could confirm that i am real but i doubt support will take that effort. Also all stuff i had are from my NA account before being merged with Europe, which has the same creation information as this account.
 All my paypall stuff i did when i was still playing on NA so they are saying that it isn't associated with that account and don't know any longer what i need to do.. how can i solve this? I have about 50 heroes unlocked and feel like i am going 2 lose it all and i am not starting all over

replies.body: I've got your ticket pulled up, and it looks like the agent was able to help you get your account back already! If you're still having problems getting signed in, hit them back up in our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and they'll be able to continue helping there!
